depositInformationBanner: Deposit sales at the cashier must be in a separate transaction and cannot be combined with sales of other products
photoInformation: Image format .jpg .jpeg .png and minimum size 360 ​​x 300px (For optimal images use minimum size 800 x 700 px).

confirm.addDescription: <bold>{{nameDeposit}}</bold> deposit will be saved and appear in the deposit list according to the settings that have been made. Continue?
confirm.editDescription: The <bold>{{nameDeposit}}</bold> deposit will be saved and appear in the deposit list according to the settings that have been made. Continue?
confirm.cancelDescription: Canceling <bold>{{nameDeposit}}</bold> will delete all data that has been inputted and cannot be undone. Continue?
confirm.deleteDescription: Deleting <bold>{{nameDeposit}}</bold> deposit will permanently remove that deposit and cannot be undone. Continue?

form.depositNameRequired: Please fill in the Deposit Name
form.sellingPriceRequired: Please fill in the Selling Price
form.depositAmountRequired: Please fill in the Deposit Amount
